description.p: You have taken drinking as your main profession. The reasons used to be important, but time and the company of your vice have blurred those lines changing their meanings into a distant vague nightmare that only haunts your dreams. Were you a soldier that has been scarred but the tragedies of war, a merchant that lost everything, or just someone that got lost in the party and decided to live that way forever? Are you the life of the party, or do you disappear into the farthest corners of the tavern to wallow in your self created darkness? You first stop in any town will almost always be the closest pub, tavern, or inn for a drink, and with that barkeeps can tell your type the minute you walk through the door. You can talk your way into any group for a free drink, and are willing to put on a good show to earn it. Being the Drunkard does have its advantages. You have talked to so many different people and races that you have picked up a thing or two, sadly those things were picked up while drinking and have a tenancy to be a bit fuzzy. You have also developed the keen ability to hold your alcohol, and with your Preserved Innards a few other perks.

ul.li: Equipment: 2 waterskins filled with ale, 1 flask filled with quality alcohol or 1 flask filled with "the good stuff"(magical item at DMs discretion), 2 empty whiskey bottles and one game set of choice.

description.p: Who are you as a drunk? What are your reasons for being this way? Do you have a preferred alcohol or do you treat all alcohol equally?

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: Quiet and reserved, I find the corners of the tavern to be left alone.
I joke and laugh about everything, even things that are inappropriate, and have a quick retort for every situation.
I am a mean drunk, and meaner when I'm sober.
Alcohol is my reason for living, I will travel the world for the best drinks!
I am a drunk, oblivious to everything.
I am the idiot savant. I know a large number of things, but only while drinking.
Nothing will get between me and my drink!.
I drink to forget, or was it to remember something? I need another drink...

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Self. I drink for me, I live for me, I always come first (Neutral Evil)
Community. I Always try to include those around me in the fun (Good)
Persuasive. Drinking is a tool. It can loosen any lips, bring happiness and bury darkness (Neutral)
Quality. Everything in life must be brought to its highest standards, the alcohol must be the best and there is no exceptions (Lawful)
Pride. I can drink more than anyone, and I'm willing to prove it! (Chaotic Good)
Pain. Life is pain, and I will help the world drown in that pain, and alcohol (Evil)

select.name: Bond
select.item: My drinking party only has my closest friends, and once you are in I will protect you with my life.
I create bonds with ease, as long as you are buying.
My only friend is my pint.
I will drink and create the best alcohol in the world!
I will fight everyone in this room if they talk poorly about my barkeep or my town.
I will face my demons, if I can remember them

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I never know when to back down, especially when it comes to drinking.
I have an addiction, and that addiction is what drives me.
I don't know when to shut up while drinking and often say things I will regret.
When I get excessively drunk you can't understand a word I'm saying.
I start fights when I'm drunk, even with my allies.
If it smells like alcohol, you wont need to dare me to drink it, bottoms up!

description.p: You have created a second identity that includes documentation, established acquaintances, and disguises that allow you to assume that persona. Additionally, you can forge documents including official papers and personal letters, as long as you have seen an example of the kind of document or the handwriting you are trying to copy.
